title: Unable to move but ping is fine
body: Has anyone else been experiencing this? My ping is fine, i have 0-1% max packet loss (watchig on the other screen i rarely have a ping timeout when this happens), and i will go for periods of 1-5 seconds of just not being able to move, use abilities, etc. I can see everyone else using their abilities fine when this happens most of the time

replies.body: The input delay does suggest an unstable connection or routing issue; though, it's interesting that the ping is sound with little packet loss.  As a first step, I'd like to rule out possible connection issues by running a [Log Reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743).  This may help find out what's going wrong and provide steps to resolve it.  Please let me know the outcome you receive!
